## fejer variable

Fej√©r weight for `k`<!-- -->-th harmonic in a Fourier series of length `n`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fejer: (k: number, n: number) => number
```

## Remarks

Used for attenuating the [gibbs](./dsp.gibbs.md) factor when summing a Fourier series. Linearly attentuates higher harmonics, with the first bin receiving a weight on 1 and the last bin `1/n`<!-- -->.
